response: "datenprivatsphäre? was ist das noch mal? 🤔 in zeitalter von social media, online-kaufen & co. seems like everyone wants access to our personal info 😱 but wait, didn't we have laws for that? 🤷‍♀️ gdpr, anyone? 🇪🇺 why do companies still try to collect & sell our data without consent? 💰👀 #dataprivacymatters #gdpr #privacyisahumanright"
